Home.title: Polyphonia Zürich
Home.subtitle: University Orchestra ETH & UZH
Home.description: The University Orchestra Polyphonia Zürich is a symphonic university orchestra composed of students and staff from ETH Zürich and the University of Zürich. Each semester during the lecture period, we prepare works from the classical orchestral repertoire and perform them in our concerts at the end of the semester.

Concerts.title: Concerts
Concerts.olderConcertsNote: Older concerts will be added soon.

Schedule.title: Rehearsal Schedule
Schedule.subtitle: Unless specifically indicated, rehearsals take place at Aki, Hirschengraben 86, 8001 Zürich
